Package nl.inl.blacklab.search.lucene

Our own extensions to Lucene, used by BlackLab.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BLSpanMultiTermQueryWrapper<Q extends org.apache.lucene.search.MultiTermQuery>
    Wraps any MultiTermQuery as a SpanQuery, so it can be nested within other SpanQuery classes.
    BLSpanMultiTermQueryWrapper.SpanRewriteMethod
    Abstract class that defines how the query is rewritten.
    BLSpanMultiTermQueryWrapper.TopTermsSpanBooleanQueryRewrite
    A rewrite method that first translates each term into a SpanTermQuery in a BooleanClause.Occur.SHOULD clause in a BooleanQuery, and keeps the scores as computed by the query.
    BLSpans
    Will be the base class for all our own Spans classes.
    BLSpansWrapper
    Wrap a "simple" Spans object in a BLSpans object.
    BLSpanTermQuery  
    DocFieldLengthGetter
    Used to get the field length in tokens for a document.
    SpanFuzzyQuery
    A fuzzy (approximate) query with spans.
    SpanQueryAnd
    Combines SpanQueries using AND.
    SpanQueryAndNot
    A SpanQuery for an AND NOT query: [word = "look" & pos !
    SpanQueryBase
    A base class for a SpanQuery with an array of clauses.
    SpanQueryDocLevelAnd
    A SpanQuery for and AND-construction at the document level.
    SpanQueryEdge
    Returns either the left edge or right edge of the specified query.
    SpanQueryFiltered
    Filters a SpanQuery.
    SpanQueryNot
    Returns all tokens that do not occur in the matches of the specified query.
    SpanQueryPositionFilter
    Filters hits from a producer query based on the hit positions of a filter query.
    SpanQueryTags
    Returns spans corresponding to a certain element (tag) type.
    SpanQueryUnique
    Makes sure the resulting hits do not contain consecutive duplicate hits.
    SpansAbstract
    SpansAbstract is our abstract base class for implementing our own Spans classes.
    SpansAndNot
    "AND NOT"-combination of two Spans objects.
    SpansDocLevelAnd
    "AND"-combination of two Spans objects.
    SpansFiltered
    Apply a Filter to a Spans.
    SpansUnique
    Remove consecutive duplicate hits from a source spans.
    TextPatternTranslatorSpanQuery
    Translates a TextPattern to a Lucene SpanQuery object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SpanQueryPositionFilter.Filter
    The different positional operations
